pullRequest.title: CB-8236: Fix repair to ensure freeipa servers are removed
pullRequest.bodyText:
Ensure old deleted FreeIPA servers are cleaned up during repair. In
addition the the expected hostnames, check FreeIPA for unexpected
hostnames and add these hostnames to the list of hostnames are are
cleaned up during the downscale process of FreeIPA repair.
This was tested locally on a cluster that was failing due to
previously deleted FreeIPA servers still being listed in FreeIPA when
the 'ipa server-find' commmand was run.
See detailed description in the commit message.

nodes.bodyText: EventHandler is deprecated, could you switch to ExceptionCatcherEventHandler?

commit.message:
CB-8236: Fix repair to ensure freeipa servers are removed

Ensure old deleted FreeIPA servers are cleaned up during repair. In
addition the the expected hostnames, check FreeIPA for unexpected
hostnames and add these hostnames to the list of hostnames are are
cleaned up during the downscale process of FreeIPA repair.

This was tested locally on a cluster that was failing due to
previously deleted FreeIPA servers still being listed in FreeIPA when
the 'ipa server-find' commmand was run.
